meanings.definition: Microscopic algae and bacteria that grow on surfaces in aquatic environments.
meanings.sent1: The periphyton in the pond provides food for small aquatic animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the periphyton to understand the health of the lake.
meanings.sent3: The periphyton threw a tiny party on the rock, celebrating their growth.
meanings.sent4: The periphyton covering the surface of the water was like a colorful carpet.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the periphyton looked like a bustling city of tiny organisms.

meanings.definition: The community of organisms that live attached to underwater surfaces.
meanings.sent1: Divers observed a diverse periphyton community on the coral reef.
meanings.sent2: The periphyton on the shipwreck provides a habitat for many fish.
meanings.sent3: The periphyton community organized a talent show on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: The periphyton colony was a bustling underwater neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The periphyton community thrived in the clear waters of the lake.

meanings.definition: The algae and other organisms that live on rocks and other surfaces in bodies of water.
meanings.sent1: The periphyton on the river rocks creates a unique ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: Fish rely on the periphyton for shelter and food.
meanings.sent3: The periphyton on the boulder seemed to be having a dance party.
meanings.sent4: The periphyton clinging to the stones was a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The periphyton on the submerged logs added a touch of green to the underwater landscape.
